General.Name: Vision Energy Corp
General.Description: Vision Energy Corporation, an energy company, develops midstream infrastructure for import, storage, and distribution of low-carbon energy products and hydrogen carriers to customers and supply-chains. It also develops a bulk liquid import and storage facility for the related products. The company was formerly known as Vision Hydrogen Corporation and changed its name to Vision Energy Corporation in November 2022. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Jersey City, New Jersey.
General.Address: 95 Christopher Columbus Drive, Jersey City, NJ, United States, 07302
